html:
Updates

** Lidar sensor maker's VLDR.O shares rise 25.7% to $4.74 - set for best day in two years

** VLDR says in a regulatory filing it has entered into an agreement to issue Amazon.com's AMZN.O subsidiary a warrant to purchase up to 39.6 mln of co's shares

** Co says warrant may be exercised at any time before Feb. 4, 2030 at a price of $4.18 per share

** VLDR says AMZN has right to designate an observer to co's board, provided the co or its affiliates hold at least 12.3 mln shares

** Up to last close, VLDR had fallen ~80% last year


(Reporting by Akash Sriram in Bengaluru)

(( Akash.Sriram@thomsonreuters.com ;))
